    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">RC vezje</string>
            <string language="en">RC Circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">RC Stromkreis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Circuit de RC</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Circuito de RC</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Circuito di RC</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">RC κύκλωμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Circuito de RC</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Tokokrog z virom, žarnico in kondenzatorjem.</string>
            <string language="en">Circuit build of source, resistor (light bulb) and capacitor is called RC circuit.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kondenzator</string>
            <string language="en">capacitor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">tokokrog</string>
            <string language="en">circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">enosmerni tok</string>
            <string language="en">direct current</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umkreisen Sie Bau der Quelle, des Widerstandes 
(Glühlampe) und Kondensator wird RC Stromkreis genannt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Circuitez la construction de la source, de la 
résistance (ampoule) et le condensateur s'appelle le circuit de RC.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Circuite a configuração da fonte, do resistor 
(bulbo claro) e o capacitor é chamado circuito de RC.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giri intorno alla configurazione della sorgente, 
del resistore (lampadina) ed il condensatore è chiamato circuito del 
RC.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κατασκευή κυκλωμάτων της πηγής, του αντιστάτη 
(ελαφρύς βολβός) και του πυκνωτή καλείται κύκλωμα RC.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Circule la estructura de la fuente, del resistor 
(bombilla) y el condensador se llama circuito de RC.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kondensator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stromkreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichstrom</string>
          </keyword>
